column1: I received this mask for complimentary testing purposes and truly loved it! The packaging is great, the smell is awesome, and my skin felt smooth and tighter after 1 use! This will def be my go to mask in the future! Also loved that it's a mask and exfoliant in 1 - very clever and saves a step in skin care for me :) [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a free trial of Clarify & Smooth Face Mask and I liked it very much, I decided to buy it and I am very pleased with the look of the skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
My fav @Influenster skincare #freebie yet! Love the way the mask cleans out my grimy oily pores ;) Awesome investment! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I absolutely love this face mask exclamation point I received a sample in the mail and words can't describe the before and after difference and feeling! The smell is amazing!

I got this to test out from Influenster and was so excited to try this new face mask! It smell good and clean and has a texture today it. I left it on for 15 minutes, rinsed it off and my face was so soft and glowy! Love this mask and I will definitely purchase once I'm done with this jar. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a fun mask to use! It's blue, which seems to be more for the experience than by nature of skin enhancing ingredients, though I'm no expert. I do enjoy this mask, it feels like it really cleans without stripping the skin. I guess that's where the comfort comes in. The scent did not bother me like some. I definitely want to try the others in this line and I would recommend it to friends. I received this free for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have pretty normal skin but this mask just didn't work for me. I did like how it smelt and my skin was soft after using it but it caused me break out. I usually have pretty clear skin but when I started using this product I broke out. I don't recommend it if you have normal skin. I received this product for free for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I received this free and I absolutely love it it has made my skin feels amazing [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have enjoyed using this amazing mask. My skin looks and feels so pretty. I received it to test but will buy it when it's finished!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

If I could give this product 6 stars I would! I was a little reluctant at first in buying it but I bought it about 3 weeks ago and the results are much higher than my expectations. I would DEFINITELY recommend!

I recently purchased the lemon clarify and smooth clay mask and wow, i was impressed!! I am already a loyal loreal girl but i just love the the way this mask was able to get rid of my dead skin leaving my face feeling SO much smoother!! Definitely buying again! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this mask for several weeks and am pleased to say it is a luxurious spa day feeling every time!!! It's soft on my skin, smells great - which I wasn't expecting at first - and leaves my skin feeling hydrated and smooth! I am a fan! Paired with the cleanser this makes for a great weekly skin care routine with that luxurious spa feel minus the spa cost!
Thanks to Influenster for my complimentary sample! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got this sent to me as a complementary gift and I'm in LOVE! It doesn't dry out your skin and make it tight like most face masks. It makes my skin look fresh and clear. I love the exfoliating scrub within it. It's definitely worth the money! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used so many different face masks I have trouble differentiating between them. However, this one left my skin feeling super hydrated and all my dead, flaky spots just peeled right off. My face was so smooth after, and not tight and dry like other masks. Love it.
Disclaimer - received this product for free in exchange for an unbiased review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product from Influenster for FREE and I absolutely love it!!! I tried it for the first time and have been so happy with the results. I was breaking out and once I used this product my face became so clear. Definitely recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. Honestly I'm not a fan. Most masks that contain clay dry your skin out, but this was worse. I've moisturized as much as possible and still cant get my face back to normal. I'll spend the extra few dollars and use posh instead. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love this mask! It has changed my skin! I never really had a lot of texture on my skin but some and this has helped my texture. I have such smooth clear skin! I love the way it smells. It's thick in consistency and I love that it has also has some exfoliating beads. It has sort of a cooling effect which I also love. This mask has easily become a holy grail! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This pure clay facial mask is most definitely one of my new go to's! I love the clay texture of it. It most definitely got rid of any dead skin cells and improved my skin texture. Although this is a powerful blend of clays it was still easy on my sensitive skin. I highly recommend this mask! I received this mask through Influenster in a vox box for FREE to test. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This mask is incredibly soothing. During application and the 15 minute setting, it was super relaxing. It rinses easily and my skin felt great after. I used the L'Oréal Clay Cleanser to wash after- great pairing. I will be using this mask once a week as recommended from now on! I received this free from Influenster for testing purposes, but these opinions are my own. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this mask! I have only tried a few facial masks but I have to say that this one is my favorite! I have oily skin and this has helped control the amount of oil on my face significantly! I did receive this complimentary thanks to #loreal and #influenster for my testing purposes! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love putting on a face mask and this one is so refreshing! I love the color as well! This mask brought my skin to life. I love using it once a week. I received this product for free for testing and will definitely purchase again when I'm out! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like everything about this mask! The scent, consistency and overall results - my skin feels smooth and tight and definitely looks healthier after using it. I had a little bit of a hard time removing the mask, but I think it's normal since it is clay-based, so not a big deal! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes but all opinions are my own. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Recieved my complimentery Pure-Clay mask in my VoxBox and on my first use it gave me the results i was looking for. Left my skin feeling smooth and amazing! Went above and beyond my expectations. Would definetely recommend to anyone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I still remember the first time opening the packaging and I felt the texture of the mask. It was very smooth and soft. It glides on my skin like butter and there were some beads in it. The scent was very refreshing. After rinsing it off my skin felt very soft and smooth like babies butt. I like how the beads exfoliate your dead skin as you wash it off. absolutely love this product. And I got this product for free to test. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I just love the LOREAL - Clear & Comfort Face Mask! As an adult it left my face feeling softer than it's ever felt. The dark circles under my eyes seem to disappear..
I received this product from Influenster free for testing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got this mask about a month ago to review. I only use it once a week just for personal preference. I did see a great difference with my skin getting alot cleaner with the cleanser and this mask. The mask leaves your skin super smooth and soft. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the lemon scent of this mask. It went on smooty and came off easily. It did not dry out my skin whatsoever. I could feel it working within minutes. I left it on for 20 minutes and was very pleased with the results even days afterwards I felt a difference. It has improved the texture of my skin since using it for almost a month now. I received this in a complimentary VoxBox from Influenster. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used this twice in the past week and I will admit I see and feel a difference. My skin feels smoother and cleaner than normal with a really nice softness. The mask did not worsen my dryness either. I would recommend this to a friend although I wish it didn't have so much a artificial tint to it. I was afraid I would rinse it off to find Smurfette looking back at me! I received this complimentary from Influenster. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was sent this mask through Influenster & fell in love! This mask not only smells amazing but leave some your skins feeling silky soft. It is easy to apply & not difficult to wash off, which is a plus! I recommended this mask to my sister & she love she it as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

First of all, this mask makes me look like a cool blue alien. I have an oily t zone with sensitive cheeks. This cleans my large pores and is gentle on my skin that my skin doesn't react. It leaves my skin soft WITHOUT drying it out. No strong scent although there is some scent but cannot pinpoint it. I received this product complimentary. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I don't use masks often but this one was so much fun! I loved the awesome blue color which made for great Instagram photos!! It felt great going on and was easy to apply. After washing off, my skin felt super soft and smooth!! It did feel a little dryer than I would have liked but that may just be my skin. Overall, I loved it'!
*I got this for free for reviewing purposes [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Omg, These products are incredible, I really loved them, I have used them for a few days and my skin is so fresh and soft. These products smell delicious, too cool. I was so excited to see that I had received this free influenster product. I'm delighted. #pureclaymyway @Influenster @LorealSkin [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got this mask in my Influenster's Vox box and it is AMAZING! It's so creamy and nice to put on and when you take it off your skin feels like butter. So far I haven't gained anotherbpimple or black head since I've been using it. Buy it and thank me later.

Received this product for testing, and I love it! The lemon scent makes it feel so pampering and fresh. Love that it's a mud mask and exfoliant in one. Just wish it came with a spatula to scoop out the product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Loved this mask for many reasons but the best part was how even and smooth my skin looked after continued use! The scent wasn't over powering and the exfoliation was just right without being too abrasive.
I received this product for free to review with my honest opinion and I will be buying again and trying the rest of the collection! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This mask is really great! It has a creamy, consistency and doesn't settle in my skin. It dries not too fast and not too slow. Feels good on the face and doesn't make it extra dry after it comes off. Makes my skin feel really clean and fresh. Just be sure to follow up with a moisturizer, as it does dry your face slightly. I did receive this complimentary for review purposes, but thoughts are my own. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received my mask almost a month ago for free to check it out...after just one use my skin was softer and smoother, more glow to my skin for sure. I used my mask 2-3 times a week depending on how cray life was that week. The texture of the mask was great has the perfect amount of exfoliation beads. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this a few weeks back and have since used it once to twice a week. My face is ABUNDANTLY more clear and smooth! The smell alone is invigorating and relaxing! It was easy to wash off after and left my face IMMEDIATELY feeling better! I highly recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got to chance to try this mask through Influenster. It's an amazing mask. It dries down but doesn't make your face all stiff. I have very red skin and after using this mask the redness went down. It really left my skin feeling refreshed. #gotitfree#influenster [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the Clarify & Smooth Face Mask from Influenster in exchange for an honest review and I am thoroughly impressed. Besides being a mask, it exfoliates so well that it cleans, refines, and brightens your skin. I now use it twice a week and the change is not subtle at all. Whenever I go makeup-free, I receive loads of compliments. I will definitely be buying again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am absolutely blown away by this mask! My skin can be sensitive so when I used it the first time I was elated when after only 10 mins on, my face felt fresh, baby soft, and it even helped clear up a few blemishes I had. I'm now obsessed. The smell is a 6/5 for me! I LOVE it! So fresh and so clean! Definite must try! I received this product free for reviewing purposes. All options are my own :) [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved this complementary mask it left my face feeling soooo smooth after using! The color is so fun and it has little seeds to exfoliate with after letting it sit for 10 to 15 minutes. I love exfoliators and masks so this was a perfect 2 in 1! Can't wait to try the others! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am absolutely shook with this product. I am blown away with the quality of the masque. The texture is really awesome and it's super easy to spread. I was pleased with the smell and texture from the very beginning. After two uses my skin definitely showed signs of improvement. I was able to try this product complementary through influenster. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received my LOREAL CLARIFY & SMOOTH FACE MASK FROM FREE FOR TESTING THROUGH INFLUENSTER FROM L'ORÉAL ,I LOVE THIS MASK HOW IS REMOVES ALL THE DEAD SKIN FROM MY FACE AND HOW IT LEAVES MY SKIN FEELING CLEAN AND LOOKING HEALTHY. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO ANYONE IT'S REALLY AWESOME AND IT REALLY WORKS [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this pure clay mask complimentary from Influenster. I was so excited to try it since I absolutely love masks. It smells like lemon but not overpowering. It goes on like a paste and with in mins drys down. It has little beads of some in it so when you go to take it off they really do exfoliate the skin well. It was super easy to come off and left my skin so smooth. My makeup goes on amazingly well after I use this mask. It's definitely going to be staying in my skincare regime.

I received this product FREE for testing purposes. I'm so glad I did. The smell is amazing! It's citrus but not overly, so relaxing. Easy to apply. The packaging is beautiful and makes you think high end yet you don't have to pay the high end price at the store. After each use I noticed my skin being brighter than before I'm in love and will be recommending this to my friends!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The clay mask felt great, smelled great and is definitely something I would use again. The scent was subtle and the mask had a smooth consistency with enough exfoliant to make my face feel fresh. The only downside was that it took a lot of product to my entire face.
I received this product free for testing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have never used a mask by L'Oréal & this one feels great.
It goes on pretty smooth & after waiting 15 minutes for it to do its work, I was surprised by the grittiness it had dried to, in a good way!
It worked off the flaky skin & left a smooth finish. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was sent this mask for free to test and review. I'm really loving it so far! It goes on smooth and seems to calm my skin after I wash it off. It's gentle enough for sensitive skin and it seems to have improved my skins texture with only a few uses. The only downfall is the scent. It's a bit too perfumy for my liking but I really like the texture of the mask so I can get past that. I'd highly recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am IN LOVE with this mask!! It leaves my skin so clear an refreshed!! I have been using it twice a week and it has helped to reduce some piples i had. My skin feels smooth, clear and refreshed ater I puto on this mask. I just leave it for 10-15min and Voila. I also love the fact that is non-dry and it is creamy so the application is easy and feels great on the skin. I Love it!! I received this product free for testing purposes from Influenster!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Good product for a good price! I used the mask once to twice weekly and love the way it exfoliates my skin and gives it a smooth and refreshed appearance. The color is fun and the smell is delightful and the mask itself is so gentle. I think this mask would be perfect for someone whose skin can't handle harsh products, but not so great for those with extreme problematic skin. I received this product for free for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

so excited I got to try this product out it was great for not only me but my 4 year old niece it definitely helped my face it felt very smooth and it smells great I felt like I was in a spa using it extremely happy I got this for free for testing from influenster [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Honestly I love this because it's gentle on my skin unlike other clay masks I have tried. It doesn't burn and washes off easily. I have been using it once or twice a week and I can't say I see much difference in my skin but I do not have problematic skin to begin with. I received this product free for honest review and feedback via Influenster. I would purchase this again for sure! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I was so excited to receive a #Complimentary bottle of the Clear & Comfort Face Mask to test from #Influenster because @Loreal never does me wrong, and I was as impressed as usual!

The texture is smooth, the scent is lovely and my face felt fresh and hydrated immediately after use! Hours later and I still have a glow...love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This face mask will leave your skin feeling extremely soft. After one use I noticed that my skin was more smoother and glowy. After 5 uses I noticed that I had less blackheads on my nose. After 7 days I noticed that it made my skin brighter. I recommend! The only thing I will say is that I wish there was more product for the price. I received this product for free from influenster for my honest review.

I received this complimentary product as a part of my Influenster VoxBox for testing purposes, and wow is it great! Not only does it smell amazing, it also works! The mask left my skin feeling great and the exfoliating factor eas great... I had a bunch of dry spots and this helped to clear them up. What a wonderful product! I do plan on purchasing! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

As a woman in her mid 40's my skin suffers from lack lustre skin appearance. With using this for 2 wks I've experienced positive results, my skin looks fresh, it feels super clean and overall has a brightened look. I love this product and this has made it into my beauty regimen indefinitely!
I received this product in exchange for my honest and unbiased review via Influenster. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Went out easy and didnt need alot to apply to full face. When it dried my face didnt feel rough like other masks. Feel fresh and clean after use. I received this product for free tor testing and review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Ive been using Loreal clear & comfort clay mask about 3 times a week for 2 weeks now and I am hooked on this stuff! My skin looks and feels clean, refreshed and bright! I love the cool feeling of the mask when I first apply it on my face. My skin looks cleaner and clearer since I started using them. I recommend this mask to everyone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is so great, I love the way the clay feels on your skin plus exfoliating material to exfoliate as the mask is removed. Leaves your face feeling nice! The only down side is the smell it has a very strong smell, if your sensitive to smells you might want to avoid. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Combination dry/normal skin type:

I absolutely ADORED this mask, the smell the feeling and the results are all worth bragging about! My face texture is something I'm constantly complaining about, I feel like this mask helped brighten my dull skin, and retexurize my face! Dry skin patches have completely disappeared. Face feels clean, refreshed, and bright! Would definitely purchase again! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

For starters: the scent of this mask is wonderful and isn't too overwhelming. The texture of the small exfoliant granules is great for super sensitive skin like mine. I just spent a week in the terrible humidity of the carribean and it really made a difference in my skin with texture, brightness and overall cleanliness! I will continue to use and see how it will benefit the rest of my skincare routine! Thanks Influenster & Voxbox for sending me this mask for free to test & review! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just tried my clarify and smooth clay mask! Im loving it, nice scent its light alittle gritty which I like. Doesnt leave face leaving dry which is a huge plsu for me! My face does feel smooth after washing! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got this product as a free sample for testing! I wasn't too excited that it was a metallic blue color.. seemed a little unnatural. Not dye free but I gave it a go. It left my skin feeling slightly tight but I moisturized and was fine. I did notice my skin seemed to look much brighter than before. And I had less blemishes the next day. All in all a good mask I would probably only use it once every other week because it's slightly drying. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product about a week ago, complimentary from Influenster. I have moderately dry and fairly sensitive skin. That being said, this product worked great! I made my skin super soft and I definitely noticed a new beautiful glow! It wasn't drying either which is a huge plus. A little goes a long way with this product do you would definitely get your money's worth. Over all, LOVED it! Would purchase as soon as I was running low on this container. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Love the smell and the ingredients, but the first time I tried out felt itchy, the itching lasted for a few seconds, by the way my skin felt smooth, refreshing and clean. Gonna use it 3 times a week for more results, I totally recommend it for people with oily skin. I received these products complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes. #GOTITFORFREE [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product free for testing purposes from Influenster. Overall, I liked this product! It was firming, made my skin feel nourished, and it calmed my redness a little bit! For being a drug store brand, I was pretty happy with it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I relieved this product complimentary for testing from influenster. I loved the smell and texture of this clay mask. I do however find it to be a little harsh on my skin from other products I have. Although it is better than some I have as well. It's not top of the line but if you are looking for a good quality affordable drug store brand, I would definitely recommend this. If I hadn't had other stuff I appreciate more than this would have been a new gonto. For me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I love how easy it was to apply and the fresh scent. It goes on easy and washes off easy to reveal a beautiful glow. It provided a nice tingle sensation as it dried. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like this mask. It smells good, and I like the texture. It's a pretty color as it dries. I also have to mention that I had some acne and it helped reduce the redness, and it went away a lot sooner thoan usual. My only complaint is that I got some in my hairline, and it was difficult to remove. Otherwise, it was awesome. I received this product for free to share my honest opinion. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was sent this complimentary of Influnster and this is my honest review! I love this mask! I was my face priority to applying this mask. There is a tinggling sensation while I have this mask on my face and I love it! I feel like it's actually working and penatrating in my pores! I love it on for 15 mins and and then with warm water I exfoliate my skin. My face feels so soft and looks bright afterwards! I love this mask and I'm definitely gonna try the other ones as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product complimentary from Influenster to try out. My honest opinion is that I absolutely love this mask! I like how well it exfoliated my skin. While on there was an amazing tingly feeling. After washing it off my face was left feeling soft and smooth. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have tried many different clay masks. Most of them cost a lot more than the Pure Clay Mask by L'Oréal Paris, but none of them compare to the great quality of this mask. It feels smooth and rixh going on, removes cleanly, and left my skin fresh and clean. My skin also looked brighter. I also love using this in combination with my L'Oréal clay cleanser. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Guys ! This product is incredible. Oh and it smells outstanding. I used this mask in my T Zone and I felt like it stripped all the excess oil off. I received this product for free to review and I will definitely be purchasing another when this runs out [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

At first look the packaging was nice and I love the mustard color. I liked the texture while applying it. After it dried it didn't feel tight or start to crack. After washing it off it did make my skin feel very soft, tho I didn't notice a difference over a period of time. I received this product free for testing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product as complimentary; however, I loved it! It smelled amazing and has made my skin feel so fresh, clean, and soft! I loved the smell of the yuzu while I waited for it to dry. The mask also has small exfoliating particles in it that left my skin feeling refreshed and smooth. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am in love with this mask! The smell is amazing! I used it multiple times one time for a sister spa night which both of us enjoyed the mask, our skin was plumped, refreshed and noticeably brighter the exfoliation was perfection and left my skin fresh and resurfaced. My makeup went on flawlessly the next day! And every time I use it my skin gets better and better! I will definitely be repurchasing this when I run out! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this mask from Influenster for free to review. I like this mask! It's so pretty, but more importantly it makes my face feel nice and cleaned out without that super-tight clay mask feeling. This isn't as drying or heavy than the other clay masks I've used. Definitely worth checking out! It's not going to revolutionize your life but if you want a clay mask that won't suck the life out of your face this is a good one! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I travel A LOT and it usually takes my skin days to recover. I put this masque to the ultimate test by using it after my trip to Chicago this weekend. I came back with dull, dry skin and knew I had exposed it to all kinds of germs on the plane. After using this Pure masque - my skin looks and feels AMAZING. I'm sold.
Note: I received this product for free from Influenster and L'oreal to review but these thoughts are truly my own. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product about 2 weeks ago complementary for influenster to test and review. In just 2 weeks I've already noticed a different in the texture and look of my skin. My skin feels smoother, softer and not nearly as oily. My pores on my nose which ive had a problem with for years are shrinking. This product is doing wonders for my skin! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Wow I did not expect this mask to be a game changer in my skincare routine, but it really was! As someone who suffers from red blotchy patches on my skin, I am always covering my face in foundation. After using this mask I was shocked to see how much the redness on my face had faded. My skin felt smooth and looked so bright and healthy after using this mask! My hate face has never looked so good! A+ L'Oreal! I received this product free for testing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Received this as a tester so I was excited to try this. So far, I have used this as directed twice weekly and I already notice results. I haveboily skin, and my pores appear smaller and less congested. The smell is also very "spa like" and soothing. Dries quickly and easy to wash off. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love using this facemask to detox my skin. It definitely makes my skin feel a lot better. It helps exfoliating the dead skin in the end when you take it off. It applies well on the skin and feels good. It doesn't dry the skin but helps unclogging the pores. If you have oily skin I highly recommend it. I received this product as complimentary to review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I honestly love the Pure-Clay Mask. It left my skin feeling so smooth and it minimized my pores. I highly recommend everyone to try out this Pure-Clay Mask! I received this product free for testing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a free sample of this product to test out and thought it was amazing. I'm usually wary of reviews when people get products for free but I can honestly say that I loved it. It's not something I ever would have purchased on my own, but it left my skin so soft. Can't wait to continue using this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've tried the other amazing masks in this line and I have to say this one is my favorite! It smells great like the others, but it has a fun yellow color. My favorite part about this mask is the exfoliation you get, I really took my time to wash this off and my skin thanked me for it, it looked brighter and smoother, it felt soft and still hydrated. Super easy to use and take off, I love it and definitely recommend! So happy and greatful for getting to try it free, thanks L'Oréal and Influenster! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I want to start off by saying that this mask smells so good!! Application was smooth and easy. I really like the texture of the mask and that it feels like a clay mask but it isn't super thick. Washing it off was also very easy and painless. After I took off the mask my face was sp soft and smooth and looked brighter than it did before!
I received this product for free from Influenster for review!

I can't get enough of this mask. I'm a spa fan that hates driving to the SPA. This clay face mask with seaweed is everything! It's super luxurious and all you need is 10 minutes! It's a creamy formula and it gently cleanses the skin and leaves it super clean and clear. My skin was sooo soft afterward and it looked so much healthier. I received this product free for testing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This mask is awesome! I've used a lot of clay masks before and usually my main complaint is that they're too harsh and they leave my skin feeing like the desert. I was worried that this one would be overly drying too, but I was pleasantly surprised! It left my skin feeling super smooth and refreshed. The texture is much lighter than other clay masks I've used and glides on easily. 5/5!
I received this product free for my honest review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product complimentary for testing purposes .. let me say first !! I am completely surprised ..
